column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cool atmosphere and delicious tapas but service was a little spotty. We ordered 4 tapas (baked goat cheese
column3: garlic shrimp and grilled hanger steak). We received the steak first
column4: approximately 5 minutes after we ordered it
column5: and it was cold. It must have been sitting out before we ordered
column6: and it just got given to us. Not cool! It was yummy
column8: but I wish it was hot. All of our tapas came out quickly
column9: but then we waited 45 minutes before we saw our waiter again to order dessert. He had a lot of tables and the tables around ours were looking for him
column10: too. Strange. Overall a good experience
column11: and I would go back. I just wish the timing of the service was a little better!
